name: Lizard Wizard (Emomilol1213, MalioT, Ludwaar, sinjitheone, nicpal94)
name_original: Lizard Wizard (Emomilol1213, MalioT, Ludwaar, sinjitheone, nicpal94)
description:
From the makers of Disaster Run, comes a student game made during a game jam, where a little lizard wizard is forced to brave through the dark cavern and solve puzzles to get himself, and his little friend Kevin Orbo out. 

Refill your light power from torches, use your ultimate to Disperse the evil hands

Activate runes with light power to rise pillars

Controls: 

Xbox Controller:

Hold RB: Activate Runes

Right Trigger: Hold and release to use Ultimate

Left Trigger: Hold to suck light from Torches

E: Activate Runes

Right Mouse Click: Hold and release to use Ultimate

Left Mouse button: Hold to suck light from Torches
